body_html:
Thanks for the bug report!

This seems like a problem with the sparse indices specifying a size greater than the size given.
The sparse tensor's indices has values that go from [0, 10), but the size passed to the constructor is (4,). Changing it to (10,) prevents a crash for me.

Will try to fix later by adding better error checking to THSTensor_(newWithTensorAndSize).

body:
Thanks for the bug report!

This seems like a problem with the sparse indices specifying a size greater than the size given. 
The sparse tensor's indices has values that go from [0, 10), but the size passed to the constructor is (4,). Changing it to (10,)  prevents a crash for me.

Will try to fix later by adding better error checking to THSTensor_(newWithTensorAndSize).
